item.title: 12 govt schools in Karnataka's Raichur to get well-stocked science lab stations, ET Education
item.description:
<![CDATA[Advt
Join the community of 2M+ industry professionals. Subscribe to Newsletter to get latest insights & analysis in your inbox. Get updates on your preferred social platform Follow us for the latest news, insider access to events and more.
Bengaluru, In a move to enhance science education in rural India, 12 government schools in Raichur district in Karnataka will be provided with well-stocked science lab stations to conduct experiments and curated science courseware aligned with the state and ...]]>
